remarks: The atom exch1ange property.  ( ~ hlatexch1 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsatexch1.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lsatexch1.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatexch1.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatexch1.u $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsatexch1.q $e |- ( ph -> R e. A ) $.
lsatexch1.r $e |- ( ph -> S e. A ) $.
lsatexch1.l $e |- ( ph -> Q C_ ( S .(+) R ) ) $.
lsatexch1.z $e |- ( ph -> Q =/= S ) $.
lsatexch1 $p |- ( ph -> R C_ ( S .(+) Q ) ) $.
